name: Unplugged (Konig Games)
description:
IF THE GAME RUNS SLOW ON YOUR MACHINE, try the low res version you can play here:

https://konig.games/GMTK2020LowRes/

In this top down survival game, you play as a robot defending yourself against the bad-bots with your bot-blast, but your blast uses so much energy that you lose one of your directional controls every time you use it!

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam. Created by Adam Konig and Sutton Bradley

We did all assets EXCEPT the environment trees and stumps that were a part of the Low-Poly Simple Nature Pack by Oleh Lila under the company name JustCreate
